watercolor-floral.name: Watercolor Floral
watercolor-floral.description: Soft watercolor florals with romantic blush tones and organic brushwork.
watercolor-floral.promptModifier: in a soft watercolor style with delicate pink roses, botanical elements, flowing brushstrokes, romantic pastel colors, hand-painted aesthetic, elegant and dreamy
watercolor-floral.negativePrompt: digital art, photograph, harsh lines, neon colors, 3d render, cartoonish

modern-minimalist.name: Modern Minimalist
modern-minimalist.description: Clean geometric compositions with refined typography and gold foil accents.
modern-minimalist.promptModifier: in a modern minimalist style with clean geometric shapes, metallic gold foil accents, calm neutral palette, crisp lines, high contrast, premium stationery aesthetic
modern-minimalist.negativePrompt: floral, ornate, cluttered, vintage, busy, distressed textures

botanical-illustration.name: Botanical Illustration
botanical-illustration.description: Detailed botanical studies inspired by vintage scientific illustration.
botanical-illustration.promptModifier: in a detailed botanical illustration style with eucalyptus leaves, fine ink line work, vintage scientific print, muted natural greens, textured paper background, precise shading
botanical-illustration.negativePrompt: abstract, neon, low detail, geometric, cartoonish
